title: 51. What Can We Do About the Hardest Patients?
description: A small number of patients with multiple, chronic conditions use a lot of resources. Dr. Jeffrey Brenner found a way to identify and treat them. Could it reduce health care spending too?
author: bapu@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
